Featured-image: CF067S-mint-sleeveless-lace-cocktail-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: An above the knee look with a mock two piece design. The bodice and skirt are both appliqued with lace for a classical style. The midriff is covered with a layer of sheer fabric. The back of the bodice is sheer with the lace covering.
